name: Radical Chess
description: Radical Chess is a 2D and 3D futuristic play-to-earn (P2E) chess game like no other. It takes the game of chess to the next level with unique and exciting gameplay. The 3D version is called Radical Chess Humanoid. This game features human characters as the chess pieces. They all have unique attributes and skills. You can watch the demo here. The 2D version is the classic chess game like most chess platforms out there but we have very competitive leaderboards that would encourage and incentivize active users on the platform.
